properties.name: redis.sdk.config.connect-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds, default is 10000

properties.name: redis.sdk.config.idle-timeout
properties.description: Maximum idle time for connections in milliseconds; idle connections exceeding this time will be closed. Default is 10000

properties.name: redis.sdk.config.keep-alive
properties.description: Whether to keep connections alive; default is true

properties.name: redis.sdk.config.min-idle-size
properties.description: Minimum number of idle connections in the pool, default is 10

properties.name: redis.sdk.config.ping-interval
properties.description: Interval for periodically checking connection availability (in milliseconds); default is 0, meaning no periodic check

properties.name: redis.sdk.config.pool-size
properties.description: Size of the connection pool, default is 64

properties.name: redis.sdk.config.retry-attempts
properties.description: Number of retry attempts, default is 3

properties.name: redis.sdk.config.retry-interval
properties.description: Interval between retries in milliseconds, default is 1000
